title: Hextech Problems
body:
Not sure where to post oce specific bugs.

It seems new hextech system hit oce a few minutes ago.
Currently when i try to open the initial premium chest it disconnects my client "Connection Timeout" along with "Crafting Failed". I have tried multiple times on both my main and my smurf but the result is the same each time. Even had a failed login attempt one time while relogging.

replies.body: I am having the same issues every time I try to craft a key from key fragments. I have lots of key fragments and chests but can't open them. :(

Likewise, same pvp.net connection issues everytime i do anything with Hextech loot/chest system. I have to skip the initial chest open just to play games... which i cant check on after the game either and this has been going on at least 5hours from this post
